description: Create an online web game like chess.com using React, Express, MongoDB, and Node.js.

tasks.name: Set up React Frontend
tasks.description: Create the basic UI for the chessboard and game controls using React and TailwindCSS.

tasks.name: Chess Logic Implementation
tasks.description: Implement the core chess game logic, including move validation and piece movement.

tasks.name: Backend Server Setup
tasks.description: Set up the Express.js backend with MongoDB database for user accounts and game data.

tasks.name: Frontend-Backend Integration
tasks.description: Connect the React frontend to the Express.js backend for data exchange.

tasks.name: User Authentication and Registration
tasks.description: Implement user login and registration functionality using the backend.

tasks.name: Game Data Storage and Retrieval
tasks.description: Implement database interactions to store and retrieve game data.

tasks.name: Basic Game UI and UX
tasks.description: Design and implement the basic UI for the game, including the chessboard, game controls, and player information.

tasks.name: Implement Real-time Communication
tasks.description: Integrate real-time communication using WebSockets or a similar technology to enable multiplayer games.

tasks.name: Multiplayer Game Logic
tasks.description: Implement the logic for handling player turns, move synchronization, and game state updates in real-time.

tasks.name: Multiplayer UI Enhancements
tasks.description: Update the UI to display opponent's moves and player information in real-time.

tasks.name: Game Lobby and Matchmaking
tasks.description: Implement a game lobby where players can search for opponents and start games.

tasks.name: Game History and Replay
tasks.description: Implement functionality to view and replay past games.

tasks.name: Game Analysis and Hints
tasks.description: Add features for analyzing games and providing hints to players.

tasks.name: User Profiles and Statistics
tasks.description: Implement user profiles to track player statistics and progress.

tasks.name: User Interface Enhancements
tasks.description: Further refine the UI and UX for a more polished and user-friendly experience.

tasks.name: Unit Testing
tasks.description: Write unit tests for core game logic and backend functionalities.

tasks.name: Integration Testing
tasks.description: Perform integration testing to ensure the frontend and backend work seamlessly together.

tasks.name: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
tasks.description: Conduct UAT to get feedback from potential users and identify any usability issues.

tasks.name: Deployment to AWS
tasks.description: Deploy the application to AWS using a suitable cloud infrastructure.

tasks.name: Post-Deployment Monitoring and Maintenance
tasks.description: Set up monitoring and maintenance procedures to ensure the application remains stable and reliable.

description: Building a full-fledged ecommerce web application with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, order processing, and secure payment integration.

tasks.name: Set up Node.js and Express.js Server
tasks.description: Configure Express.js server, define API endpoints, and implement basic routing.

tasks.name: Database Design and Implementation
tasks.description: Design MongoDB schema for products, users, orders, and other essential entities. Implement MongoDB connection and CRUD operations.

tasks.name: Authentication System
tasks.description: Implement user authentication using JWT (JSON Web Token) for secure login and registration.

tasks.name: Create React Application
tasks.description: Set up a new React project using Create React App, install necessary dependencies, and implement basic routing.

tasks.name: Build Product Display Page
tasks.description: Design and implement product listing components, including filtering and sorting functionality, using TailwindCSS for styling.

tasks.name: Create User Interface Components
tasks.description: Develop reusable UI components for login, registration, product details, cart, and checkout pages.

tasks.name: Integrate Frontend with Backend APIs
tasks.description: Connect React components with backend APIs using Fetch or Axios for data fetching and manipulation.

tasks.name: Implement Product Management
tasks.description: Develop frontend functionality for adding, updating, and deleting products, utilizing backend API endpoints.

tasks.name: Implement Shopping Cart and Checkout
tasks.description: Build a robust shopping cart system with functionalities like adding/removing items, calculating totals, and handling checkout flow.

tasks.name: Unit and Integration Testing
tasks.description: Write unit tests for individual components and integration tests for API interactions.

tasks.name: UI/UX Testing
tasks.description: Conduct usability testing to ensure smooth user experience and identify areas for improvement.

tasks.name: Deployment on AWS
tasks.description: Deploy the application on AWS cloud platform using Elastic Beanstalk or other suitable services.

tasks.name: Implement Payment Gateway Integration
tasks.description: Integrate a secure payment gateway like Stripe or PayPal for processing online transactions.

tasks.name: Add Search Functionality
tasks.description: Develop a search bar and implement a robust search algorithm for finding relevant products.

tasks.name: Improve User Experience and Design
tasks.description: Refine user interface and user experience based on feedback and testing results.
